snippet: Hong Kong's government is trying to maintain the territory's momentum toward becoming an Islamic finance centre, as other potential sukuk issuers show little enthusiasm....

headline.print_headline: Hong Kong Works to Keep Islamic Finance Momentum as Firms Balk
headline.main: Hong Kong Works to Keep Islamic Finance Momentum as Firms Balk

lead_paragraph: Hong Kong's government is trying to maintain the territory's momentum toward becoming an Islamic finance centre, as other potential sukuk issuers show little enthusiasm.
